data_description.name: A name for this Inception hub
data_description.token: An Inception User API token. Available under Users > Remote / Web Access > User API Token.
data_description.host: The host address of your Inception hub. If no protocol is specified, http:// will be used.

init.description: Configure alarm code settings for your Inception alarm panels.

data_description.require_pin_code: When enabled, a code is required for area arming/disarming. If disabled, area operations will be performed as the user which is associated with the configured API token.
data_description.require_code_to_arm: When enabled, a valid code must be entered to arm the alarm. When disabled, a code is only required for disarming.

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.description: Unlocks a door. If a time is provided, a timed unlock is used.

time_secs.name: Seconds
time_secs.description: Number of seconds to grant access.

area_arm.name: Area Arm
area_arm.description: Arms an area with custom exit delay and seal check settings.

exit_delay.name: Exit Delay
exit_delay.description: If true, puts the Area into Exit Delay mode for a specified length of time before the Area arms fully. The length of the exit delay time is determined by the Area item's settings in the Inception web interface.

seal_check.name: Seal Check
seal_check.description: If true, performs a seal check on the Inputs associated with this area. If any Inputs are found to be unsealed, the area will fail to arm.

code.name: Code
code.description: PIN code for arming the area. If omitted, defaults to the user which is associated with the configured API token.
